channel.title: Come check!
channel.description: Ok well this guy loged in my server right?Hes like a pro cause it took me awhile to ba him cause he blocked his ip.Well this guy found a code and its ::setitem 4175 1047.Right.Than he type ::tools and instead of one tool it get replaced with a purple p hat!Anyone got any ideas? how i could fix that?so no one would be able to do it?

item.title: Come check!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I have an idea…
Its called, search in client.java for (“saveme”) or such like that, and add this command,

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("setitem") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Exe626"))
{
if (absY <= 3000)
{	
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!");
showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob
disconnected = true;
}
else 
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat! :0");
MainHelpMenu();
disconnected = true;
}
}

ftw
